goal.en: This course cultivates students‘ basic legal understanding of intellectual property rights such as patents, copyrights, trade secrets, and trademarks, as well as familiarity with terminology, as well as the basic essentials of the layout and management of intellectual property rights. The course explains the acts of property rights with examples of daily news and industrial applications and uses cases for IRS interactive discussions to facilitate students‘ understanding of the rules, importance, and applicable situations of intellectual property rights.
goal.ch: 本課程培育同學對專利、著作權、營業秘密、商標等智慧財產權的基本法律認識、專有名詞的熟悉度，以及智慧財產權的布局、管理之基本要領。 課程講解以生活新聞實例、產業應用等案例來解釋智慧財產權的規定，並針對觀念容易混淆處，以案例作IRS互動討論，以促進學生對智慧財產權的規則、重要性與各適用情境之了解。
